example.text: The newspaper boys cracked jokes and again Barco 's pride was aroused [*-1] .

example.text: But new-product development will make Japanese companies stronger, and big investments in ``domestic'' industries such as beer will make it even tougher for foreign competitors to crack the Japanese market.

example.text: She had taken him out of the schoolhouse and closed the school for the summer , after she saw Miss Snow crack Joel across the face with a ruler for [*] letting a snake loose in the schoolroom .

example.text: *T* Cracking down on crime and stamping out "black gold" politics remains a central plank of the new government's platform.
